value.EN: Once in this Zone you may perform {symbol agilitySymbol} test: on success
Once in this Zone you may perform {symbol socialSymbol} test: on success
Once in this Zone you may perform {symbol fixSymbol} test: on success
Once in this Zone you may perform {symbol battleSymbol} test: on success
perform next 4 {symbol agilitySymbol} tests with Advantage
perform next 4 {symbol socialSymbol} tests with Advantage
perform next 4 {symbol fixSymbol} tests with Advantage
perform next 4 {symbol battleSymbol} tests with Advantage
perform all tests with Advantage in this Zone
if the Zone is not marked as Solved, solve it

Once in this Zone you may pay 1 Gold to accept. Roll up to 6 dice one by one, stop when you want. If sum 22+, {bold}End{endbold}. Reset and roll up to 6 dice, stop when sum is 17+. If sum is 22+ or lower than previous roll, +2 Gold

Once in this Zone you may pay 1 Gold to accept. Roll up to 6 dice one by one, stop when you want. If sum 22+, {bold}End{endbold}. Reset and roll up to 6 dice, stop when sum is 18+. If sum is 22+ or lower than previous roll, +2 Gold

Once in this Zone you may pay 1 Gold to accept. Roll up to 6 dice one by one, stop when you want. If sum 22+, {bold}End{endbold}. Reset and roll up to 6 dice, stop when sum is 19+. If sum is 22+ or lower than previous roll, +2 Gold
Once in this Zone you may pay 1 Gold to accept. Bet on light or dark dice, roll all 6 dice, and sum light dice and dark dice separately. If the dice you've bet on have higher value, +2 Gold
Once in this Zone you may pay 1 Gold to accept. Roll 5d6, you may reroll any number of dice once. Group dice by number value. Gain +1 Gold for each group with 2+ dice
Once in this Zone you may pay 1 Gold to accept. Roll all 6 dice, you may reroll any number of dice once. Create dice pairs with the same value. Gain +1 Gold for each pair

Once in this Zone you may accept. Perform {symbol battleSymbol} test on {bold}21{endbold}-22: {bold}End{endbold} on fail. Then you may raise target values by 1 and repeat up to 3 times or gain 1 Gold per success and {bold}End{endbold}

Once in this Zone you may accept. Perform {symbol agilitySymbol} test on {bold}21{endbold}-22: {bold}End{endbold} on fail. Then you may raise target values by 1 and repeat up to 3 times or gain 1 Gold per success and {bold}End{endbold}

Once in this Zone you may accept. Perform {symbol battleSymbol} test on {bold}21{endbold}-22: {bold}End{endbold} on fail. Then you may lower target values by 1 and repeat up to 3 times or gain 1 Gold per success and {bold}End{endbold}

Once in this Zone you may accept. Perform {symbol agilitySymbol} test on {bold}21{endbold}-22: {bold}End{endbold} on fail. Then you may lower target values by 1 and repeat up to 3 times or gain 1 Gold per success and {bold}End{endbold}

Once in this Zone you may pay 1 Health to accept. Perform {symbol fixSymbol} test on {bold}21{endbold}-22: 1 Gold on success, {bold}End{endbold} on fail. Then you may raise target values by 1 and repeat up to 3 times

Once in this Zone you may pay 1 Health to accept. Perform {symbol fixSymbol} test on {bold}21{endbold}-22: 1 Gold on success, {bold}End{endbold} on fail. Then you may lower target values by 1 and repeat up to 3 times

Once in this Zone you may pay 1 Health to accept. Perform {symbol socialSymbol} test on {bold}21{endbold}-22: 1 Gold on success, {bold}End{endbold} on fail. Then you may raise target values by 1 and repeat up to 3 times

Once in this Zone you may pay 1 Health to accept. Perform {symbol socialSymbol} test on {bold}21{endbold}-22: 1 Gold on success, {bold}End{endbold} on fail. Then you may lower target values by 1 and repeat up to 3 times
Once in this Zone you may pay 1 Gold to accept. +2 {symbol healSymbol}
Once in this Zone you may accept. Roll on Creature Type table and note the result. When you succeed in a {symbol battleSymbol} test against it: +1 Gold and remove the note
Once in this Zone you may accept. Roll on Creature Type table and note the result. When you succeed in a {symbol socialSymbol} test against it: +1 Gold and remove the note
Once in this Zone you may accept. Roll on Creature Type table and note the result. When you succeed in a {symbol fixSymbol} test against it: +1 Gold and remove the note
Perform any test with Disadvantage for 4 Zones
Perform any test with Disadvantage until some Health is gained
1 {symbol woundSymbol}. Perform {symbol agilitySymbol} test: 1 {symbol woundSymbol} on fail
1 {symbol woundSymbol}. Perform {symbol battleSymbol} test: 1 {symbol woundSymbol} on fail
1 {symbol woundSymbol}. Perform {symbol fixSymbol} test: 1 {symbol woundSymbol} on fail
1 {symbol woundSymbol}. Perform {symbol socialSymbol} test: 1 {symbol woundSymbol} on fail
Roll 1d6: move to the n-th side counting from north and going clockwise. Do not move if destination is not reachable
Roll 1d6: move to the n-th side counting from north and going counterclockwise. Do not move if destination is not reachable
For 2 times, roll 1d6: move to the n-th side counting from north and going clockwise. Do not fill in-between Zones. Do not move if destination is not reachable
For 2 times, roll 1d6: move to the n-th side counting from north and going counterclockwise. Do not fill in-between Zones. Do not move if destination is not reachable
Perform any {symbol agilitySymbol} test with Disadvantage. Every time you move to another Zone you may perform a {symbol fixSymbol} test: back to normal on success
Perform any {symbol battleSymbol} test with Disadvantage. Every time you move to another Zone you may perform a {symbol fixSymbol} test: back to normal on success
Perform any {symbol fixSymbol} test with Disadvantage. Every time you move to another Zone you may perform a {symbol fixSymbol} test: back to normal on success
Perform any {symbol socialSymbol} test with Disadvantage. Every time you move to another Zone you may perform a {symbol fixSymbol} test: back to normal on success
1 {symbol woundSymbol} when moving to another Zone until you eat food
Move to the nearest Solved Zone if any or to the Portal Zone. If you have more than 1 Gold, set your Gold to 1
Move to the nearest Solved Zone if any or to the Portal Zone. If you have more than 2 Health, set your Health to 2
Roll another Event before moving to another Zone
Before moving to the next Zone you may perform {symbol agilitySymbol} test: do not roll for an Encounter on success
Before moving to the next Zone you may perform {symbol battleSymbol} test: do not roll for an Encounter on success
Before moving to the next Zone you may perform {symbol fixSymbol} test: do not roll for an Encounter on success
Before moving to the next Zone you may perform {symbol socialSymbol} test: do not roll for an Encounter on success
There appears to be something shiny on the tree, but it needs to be climbed.
Someone forgot their bag on a branch.
Some snakes defend a small pouch.
A steep descent of dry leaves leads to a small cavity.
A small striped feline moans sadly. It needs care.
A small glowing creature hovers around a tiny chariot.
You see something under a pile of wood.
There are some vegetables around. Maybe you can cook something.
To be able to camp here you need to remove the weeds.
A wolf cub wants to make friends.
A mercenary is resting near a tree.
A tired carriage driver waves you on.
A tiny creature cries while sitting near a log.
A herd of animals blocks the passage.
A massive creature runs towards you roaring!
You have inadvertently stumbled upon the den of a dangerous animal!
A woodcutter points to an axe with a challenging look.
The branches shake and something is on you!
A fox continues the journey with you.
A voice suggests you to be careful and disappears into silence.
You finally manage to pick off some brambles.
A strange tool has been hidden in a tight space.
A tuft of healing grass sprouts from the rocks.
A slender creature is expertly weaving branches together.
The trees seem to whisper something new to each other.
The scent of some flowers seems to loosen your tongue.
A small group of creatures seem to be talking about you.
Some creatures talk to each other by whistling. You understand something.
You receive a wreath as a gift.
Small creatures with tiny spears begin following your path.
You move a large log with your bare hands. But how did you do it?
There is a wooden spear among the branches.
A school of tasty fish runs along a clean stream.
Something plump and succulent has missed you.
A woman hands you a leaf with some fruit.
You come across a waterfall of clean water.
You find a bush of juicy berries.
A juicy fruit bends the branch of a tree.
A large inviting mushroom grows near a group of rocks.
A small mound of walnuts rests at the foot of a tree.
You will find the jelly very cool to the touch.
A small creature drops a nut and runs away.
You find another abandoned water bottle, half empty.
"{STARTQUOTE}I needed exactly someone like you!{ENDQUOTE}" You solved its problem in a flash!
With one leap you could reach a container on the other side.
A small animal hid something in a small cavity.
A light shines from a narrow passage between the rocks.
You see something at the bottom of a cliff.
A rock creature appears to cry in front of a pile of stones.
You find some scattered circular stones. Is it a puzzle?
Something seems hidden among the rubble.
You find an abandoned pot on top of some wood, ready for cooking.
You find a dirty piece of paper. There might be something useful written on it.
A proud bird perched on a stone turns towards you as if listening.
On a stone sits a tired traveler in the mood for chatting.
A figure with a large backpack and ropes offers to guide you.
You hear the echo of a cry but you don't understand where it comes from.
Two giant creatures are fighting, blocking the path.
"{STARTQUOTE}They told me you're a tough one. Let's see!{ENDQUOTE}"
Some rocks come to life and slowly move towards you.
A squat, bristly animal charges toward you!
A mysterious figure smashes a rock with a single punch. Challenge it!
Something pops out of the rocks and is right on you!
A small, furry creature appears to follow you, leaping from stone to stone.
A torn hanging backpack reminds you that you should be careful.
You find a very solid branch, to use as a stick.
You decide to sit down and get yet stone off your shoe.
A strange, pointed stone catches your attention.
Someone is whispering in the dark. You can't believe your ears!
You found an elaborate pin on a corpse.
Two distant groups communicate by flashing a light. You learn a new word.
Around here they think you're good-looking, you know?
A small group of dwarves are walking the same path as you.
A traveler pats you on the back. It almost breaks it.
You can easily take down a small flock of birds.
A chubby rabbit doesn't seem to notice you.
A purple-faced man mutters something about unsold wine.
It doesn't taste good but it grows abundantly here.
You find a huge pod, surprisingly easy to open.
Someone must have left their lunch on a flat stone.
Some medicinal herbs emerge between two stones.
A tiny creature, standing on a stone, extends its tiny glowing staff towards you.
A small waterfall of cool water sparkles from a wall.
Someone thanks you warmly... but you don't know who it is.
By diving in you might be able to recover something useful.
Something fell into the water. Maybe you can catch it before it falls!
There is something at the bottom but you can't get it.
A powerful spray of water is about to hit you!
Some slippery rocks lead to a cave.
A strange creature with gills is gasping for air as it lies on the ground.
You see something useful but you need to drain the water first.
You find a small container encrusted with shells and salt.
Walking on algae is too dangerous. You should clean the area.
A seagull lands on your shoulder.
"{STARTQUOTE}Do you want to hear a story, buddy?{ENDQUOTE}"
A small boat approaches, offering you to continue.
You hear the sad song of a siren.
A young man is meditating in a column of water. Can you make yourself heard?
A guy with a strange hat bumps into you on purpose.
You hear a growl coming from the water.
A strange creature with gills is approaching menacingly!
"{STARTQUOTE}How good are you at arm wrestling, finless?{ENDQUOTE}"
Something jumps out of a pile of sand. It's after you!
In every body of water, you see a face that is not yours. Who is it?
You almost slipped. You'll be more careful.
After struggling for a while, you now feel much more agile.
You found a place to clean the sand off your boots.
The handle of a lost tool emerges from a mound of sand.
You have collected some brackish water. It can be useful.
You have learned how to tie a new knot.
A crumpled sheet of paper reports today's news.
You smell the scent of the sea carried by the breeze.
Two figures communicate with gestures. You begin to learn too.
"{STARTQUOTE}You don't look like you're from around here. Let me help you.{ENDQUOTE}"
Hear your name in the wind.
You've found some shells stuck together. Looks like brass knuckles...
A chatty vendor offers you some fish.
Someone left a bottle of the good ones behind.
Some say these mollusks are edible. It's time to try.
Some seafood rests on a rock.
Someone left a little package here.
In a jar, you find a greenish paste. They probably eat it around here.
You managed to open a sea urchin.
Unexpectedly you see a small stream of fresh water.
You are in the right place at the right time.
Someone surrounded a small container with sharp spikes.
Something is slowly sinking in the sand. Maybe you can catch it.
To avoid sinking, you have to crawl for a short distance.
You should be able to slip near one of the dens.
A small, scaly creature is struggling to breathe due to excessive thirst.
You find a broken tent. It could help you shelter from the sun and heat.
You find a knotted rope bridge.
You find the vegetables and spices you need to prepare something.
Someone in a turban reaches out to you.
A caravan offers you a ride.
A figure weeps before a small grave.
A huge sandy creature doesn't seem to want to move.
A fistful of sand hits your face and you're surrounded!
Something is tightening around your neck!
"{STARTQUOTE}You look like you're looking for a true challenge!{ENDQUOTE}"
Something suddenly appears from the sand!
A thief escapes by throwing sand in the eyes of a guard. It's a good idea...
You find a mobile clothing store.
A small fountain finally allows you to rinse your eyes.
You find a tool, black and shiny like onyx.
You overheard a recipe for an ointment.
A worker appears to be using an unfamiliar technique.
You can't believe your eyes and can't wait to tell someone about it.
You've made it this far and you're proud of it.
Someone mistakes you for a local.
You have managed to learn a new word in the local language.
You found a place to take a bath.
A colony of red ants follows you.
A four-legged creature is following you. What does it want?
There's a strange weapon stuck in there.
An inviting cluster hangs from a strange plant.
A fruit the size of a watermelon emerges from the ground.
You find a large vase full of water.
You managed to get some dried fruit.
The food around here is very spicy!
You find a huge plant covered in needles. You know how to take care of it.
There's some abandoned food. It doesn't look good but...
An old man offers you a cup with a strange healing infusion.
Someone sees you and runs away. Problem solved!
It's too cold. You have to jump over it.
If you reach out without slipping, you might catch it.
The ice has covered a stack of crates. You should be able to reach it...
You have to cross a sheet of ice.
Something shattered a small ice house.
A pile of ice blocks the passage.
Maybe you can cook yourself some fish. Not that there's much else here.
The passage is completely covered in snow.
A figure, covered from head to toe, begins to follow you.
Despite the cold, someone decided to have a chat.
A strange craft glides toward you. The pilot glances at you.
A small creature sobs in front of a shattered ball of ice.
A hairy giant minds his own business in your path.
"{STARTQUOTE}You won't get away with it this time!{ENDQUOTE}"
The air suddenly gets colder and something is on you!
They say it's as small as it is dangerous. Be careful!
"{STARTQUOTE}They say hot-bloods don't know how to fight.{ENDQUOTE}" someone sneers.
You're about to slip... and it's no accident.
A line of clumsy animals walks alongside you, never taking their eyes off you.
You've found a reinforcement for your boots.
There is a strange instrument, made of ice.
You find ice of an atypical color. You remember what it is for.
A guy is messing around with some weird goo in a bucket. Interesting.
With this echo, whispering is useless. Now you know it too.
Looks like you have some fans, huh?
Someone you met a while ago recognizes you.
You are learning to fight the cold and speak normally.
Some ice armors begin to escort you.
"{STARTQUOTE}I will not abandon you.{ENDQUOTE}" says a sweet, maternal voice.
There is an ice spear abandoned on a wall.
There are some small crustaceans. You saw someone cooking them.
You should be able to get some fish here.
A plate appears from a curtain, then suddenly closes.
There is a small lake of crystal clear, frozen water.
However few they are, you will make do with them.
You should stop and eat some real food. But in the meantime...
You've never seen a berry this big!
It is customary to leave food for the pilgrims. Here it is.
A figure offers you to try his miracle ointment...
Is food walking toward you? You see a tiny creature running away.
You find a small source of very cold water.
Someone you don't recognize hugs you.
It takes a long jump to cross the muddy terrain.
You have to put your whole arm in... but it's worth it.
You can crawl through the foliage to grab something.
It's slippery but you should be able to catch it.
The ground is slippery. But you can use it to your advantage.
An animal with a broken shell appears to be agitated.
Maybe you can dry some mud to fix it.
By scraping away the slime you should be able to move it.
You could cook something with some leftovers.
Finally, you find clean water. You can clean up your stuff.
A face appears from the mud. It wants to talk to you.
A sweaty guy seems to have something to tell you.
A bizarre figure floats on a flying boat. "{STARTQUOTE}Nice, huh?{ENDQUOTE}"
Someone cries in front of a puddle of mud.
They ask you to step away from the fight. It's none of your business.
A mud-covered figure points a knife at you.
A greenish creature emerges from the slime.
A fetid furball has targeted you!
A splash of mud... and something runs towards you!
The scent of some small plants makes you feel lighter.
Someone points to a spot and puts their index finger to their lips.
By lightening your luggage you should reduce the risk of sinking.
You've learned where to put your feet.
You find something useful in the mud.
You find some mud and medicinal herbs to make medicine.
"{STARTQUOTE}You have to moisten it. That's how you do it.{ENDQUOTE}"
Someone above a tree is chattering loudly.
"{STARTQUOTE}So there's still someone who isn't afraid of adventure! Good!{ENDQUOTE}"
There are signs carved into the trunks. You begin to recognize them.
You get some mud off your back.
Some figures with painted faces march in your direction.
You see the faint glow of a crystal. Your body is rested.
There is a strange dirty book, abandoned on the floor.
Some had to flee in a hurry, leaving their food behind.
From the top of a tree, someone throws a spherical object at you.
The water here is less muddy. Almost crystal clear.
It's hard to find anything edible around here. Better to ration your food.
It's dirty. But at least it's edible.
Although it is small, this fruit weighs a lot and has a great flavor.
A nearly intact basket floats on the mud.
Some resin comes out of a tree. It is supposed to be healing.
A small, frightened insect leaves its floating leaf. There is food.
Somehow you manage to filter something to drink from the dirty water.
"{STARTQUOTE}Come! He's the one who helped us!{ENDQUOTE}"
You could use a puff of steam to give you momentum and reach it.
By reaching between the gears you can reach a small container.
Some gears open and close a passage. With the right timing...
A long axis is spinning. By bending down you can pass over.
Crawling through the eerie creaks you should reach a secret room.
A small, turned-off humanoid machine sits on the ground.
You don't know what this machine does but it could use a little fixing.
This pile of debris is now just blocking the passage. You can get rid of it.
There is a small pot that heats up without the need for fire!
Some splinters prevent some gears from working.
You hear a thin voice coming from a small brass cube.
A driverless carriage would like assist you.
A sentient puppet squeaks as it looks at its missing body part.
The only way to open this gate is to convince him with words.
Some puppets activate and come towards you!
A cluster of cubes is merging to form a giant humanoid...
You hear a group of wooden and iron quadrupeds growling.
You disappeared in a cloud of steam... someone's there!
A long line of glowing cylinders skips across your path.
A luminous sign tells you to be careful. Why?
You find a pair of strange walking sticks, with a spring on the end.
You find a strange contraption to mount on one of the limbs.
You found a slightly damaged multitool.
There is a metal box containing some vials.
A small machine crackles and prints out today's news.
A passage identifies you and opens by itself.
Some machines make sounds. You understand something.
You find a garment adorned with a small gear.
A dull clanking sound follows you but you see nothing.
You only noticed the buzzing after it stopped. You feel much better now.
You find a strange weapon that moves on its own.
You find a mountain of crates. Each one has a different fruit drawn on it.
A strange metallic creature dressed as a chef hands you something.
You found some abandoned metal cans. The cap is easy to open.
Someone must have boxed the berries one by one.
Why do they insist on packaging the fruits individually?
You've never seen this food so big. How do they do it?
Someone left a locked container. There's still something inside.
You recognize the writing on a syringe. Finally!
Something hits your feet, leaves a small object, and goes away.
There is a long row of small ornate glasses that smell great.
"{STARTQUOTE}I've never been able to thank you properly!{ENDQUOTE}"
Although it looks like it's about to collapse, you should be able to reach it.
To reach it you would have to go through some narrow bars.
By bending down, you can reach it without being seen.
A grotesque statue holds something in its hand.
You can try waiting for the right moment behind some gravestones.
If you don't intervene immediately, it will risk dying.
There is a marble plaque in pieces. What will be written on it?
To interrupt the ritual you must Break the Circle.
Someone is trying to light a fire.
Behind the dirt, there is a writing.
A figure is very keen to tell you about his beliefs.
Even though it's all bones, it wants to talk to you.
A gloomy hearse gives you a lift for a short distance.
A figure cries in front of a small niche.
An old man is slowly closing an open hole in your path.
A few workers in worn clothes slowly approach, dragging their tools.
An arm emerges from the earth.
Some dark birds have targeted you.
A guy with a big hat challenges you to see who can take out the most.
It seemed like they were resting, but instead...
A row of greenish lights floats above you.
Someone is sneaking up walls. You could do it too...
You hear someone saying a faint prayer.
You find a tool made of bones.
You find some sticks and some strings.
It appears to be common in these parts to mummify the deceased.
You heard that someone important died.
Some people find your clothes very noble.
Some local proverbs mention the Book of the Dead.
You have a memory of a deceased loved one.
You find a weapon as white as ivory.
If you cook them well, you should be able to eat these larvae.
You find an abandoned load of food.
You are right to believe that whoever left the food here is still alive...
A river with reddish water flows around here.
Blood-red berries shine among the foliage.
A citrus fruit hangs from a low tree.
If it were smaller, it would look like a cherry.
You feel the creaking under your feet. How lucky!
Some of the concoctions they use here have healing properties.
An insect abandoned prey that was perhaps a little too big for it.
Some dull-eyed men offer you some strange wine.
As soon as they see you, they run away.
A trench runs around some containers.
If you reach out a little further you might get it.
Someone dug a hole. What's on the other side?
You have to go through the chaos to get to the other side.
You'll have to crawl through the dirt to reach it.
A soldier lies on the ground in pain.
Someone kicks a large jammed cannon.
There are some dead bodies with their belongings.
Someone, badly wounded, walks beside you.
A figure wants to tell you about the war.
A cart carrying supplies wants to offer you a ride.
It's dead. There's nothing you can do to go back.
"{STARTQUOTE}It's all your fault and your ideas!{ENDQUOTE}"
A creature made of shreds of flesh emerges from a pile of corpses.
A muscular figure challenges you to arm wrestling.
An agile figure follows you from above.
A group of injured people are dragging themselves down the street. Better be careful.
With this tool, you can repair your stuff.
There is a box with bandages, some ointments, and a booklet.
It seems that sometimes a kick is enough to fix things.
Some soldiers are talking about a strategy. Maybe they should keep their voices down.
This corpse will no longer need this tag.
A soldier bets he saw you on the battlefield.
Two soldiers exchange signs. You understand them.
A platoon follows your same path.
Even if it's unloaded, a weapon is a weapon.
You find a crate of food.
Among the rubble, you find some intact food.
In a tent, they offer food to the veterans.
They are filling some water bottles.
You find some food, probably from far away.
You could eat dozens of them... but not this big.
You find a backpack that no one will ever claim again.
There is a strange herbal poultice.
There is some liquor with a pungent scent.
"{STARTQUOTE}Give it a medal!{ENDQUOTE}" someone says. But who is it?
A branch tears off part of your luggage.
A steep descent drags you down the valley.
Some slippery rocks make you stumble.
A strange plant clings to your backpack.
Everywhere you turn, everything seems the same. Your head is spinning.
A small insect crawls on your arm.
You get caught in an animal trap.
Someone hits you from behind. Who is it?
A strange contraption suddenly snorts and explodes!
Suddenly you feel your arms weak.
You should get some new weapons.
You feel an unexpected and strong sensation of vomiting.
Here they are again. They are plotting something against you.
Why does your head feel so dizzy?
Suddenly you feel your legs weak.
Suddenly everything goes dark and you feel yourself being dragged.
A sharp pain in the back of your neck is all you remember.
You were sure it was the right path.
This place is familiar to you. Unfortunately.
You have no idea where you're headed.
Since when did your stuff get so heavy?
You weren't ready to face such a climb.
You feel like throwing up. Why?
The jump was higher than expected.
One of the stones you hung on was sharp.
You go through a narrow passage. Maybe a little too narrow.
You're struggling to breathe and your vision is blurry.
The air is thin and you struggle to breathe.
After a long slide, you find yourself having to start over again.
Your skin is very chapped... almost like stone.
A rock cracks beneath one of your feet, trapping it. It's blocked!
"{STARTQUOTE}How dare you wander around these mountains?{ENDQUOTE}"
A landslide almost takes you out!
A group of bandits is aiming at you with a crossbow.
Maybe you strained your arms a little too much.
Your forehead is hot and sweaty.
People look at you suspiciously. Why?
Suddenly you can't think of anything.
The compass has broken again and you can't stop thinking about it.
Something is slowing down your reflexes.
How long has it been since you ate?
It was a trap... but now it's too late.
You get a message. You need to go back and you need to do it fast!
The compass seems to be going crazy.
You took the wrong road again.
The wind blows sand into your eyes.
Walking through the wet sand has tired you out.
A nauseating smell of seaweed makes your head spin.
You should have boiled the water a little longer.
You should have been careful where you leaned.
You walked barefoot where you shouldn't have.
The saltwater on your wounds makes you itch.
Something makes you feel very nauseous.
You have inadvertently disturbed a creature with a spiky shell.
The skin becomes covered with blisters.
Suddenly you can't feel your fingers anymore.
A creature covered in scales takes you by surprise!
The water begins to swallow everything! What can you do?
A small group of sailors approaches menacingly.
You feel pain in your shoulder.
Your weapons could use some maintenance...
There's something wrong with your clothes.
You have a terrible suspicion that you were wrong.
You hear shards clanking in your backpack. That's never good news.
Suddenly the world seems to be moving faster.
Suddenly you fall to the ground. You need a doctor immediately!
Damn, it's them! You can only run away...
Did you have to go north or south?
Part of the map is illegible.
The water in the canteen has become undrinkable.
You had to make a big effort. All your muscles hurt.
You need a sip of water.
The effects of too much sun become more intense.
Suddenly the floor seems to be on fire!
The skin appears to be cracking.
Something stings you and runs away. You struggle to move.
A hooded woman threatens you with a scimitar.
Everything seems to be sinking into the sand. You have to do something!
You get dragged into an illegal gambling den.
You feel a sharp pain in your knee.
Your weapon grip moves a little too much.
Long dark circles line your eyes.
Thoughts get confused in your mind.
You tried your hardest. Why don't you feel confident then?
You need to put something in your stomach.
Turning your back on someone in need continues to haunt you. You need to do something.
That damn kid showed you the wrong way.
The road suddenly curves and takes you elsewhere.
It's too late to go back.
Your sense of direction is off.
You thought it was because of the fever. It's not.
Too much cold didn't do you any good.
It was supposed to be easy. And instead...
You feel a stinging sensation under your clothes.
You are forced to crawl, despite the terrain.
You sneeze a little too often.
The arm. It doesn't move anymore.
"{STARTQUOTE}Here's our catch. Worth a lot of money!{ENDQUOTE}"
Your weapon doesn't seem to be effective.
Your voice cracks as you try to speak.
The conditions here are perhaps a little too extreme for you.
If you had known this before... you have to run now.
You should have already been at your destination... Where are you?
It's almost impossible to walk around here.
A strange insect stings you and flies away.
How did you get that bruise?
The swampy terrain slows your movements.
You are at the final reckoning.
A wave of mud rises over you.
"{STARTQUOTE}You are destroying our lands. You will pay for this!{ENDQUOTE}"
It will be difficult to use your weapon in this weather.
You can't think of anything else and it doesn't help.
That time you almost didn't make it.
You struggle to bend your arms.
You feel pain in your abdomen.
You have to go back. And fast.
"{STARTQUOTE}I won't let you go any further.{ENDQUOTE}"
Was it this way or that way?
This route is not on the map.
It emits a black puff and stops working.
You hear a constant, unbearable grinding of gears.
A blast of boiling air takes you by surprise.
A part of the room moves, catching you off guard.
You thought he would stay still and instead, it came at you.
Some splinters are starting to cause you pain.
The incessant sound of clanking metal gives no respite.
You have to act at the right time if you don't want to get hurt again.
You don't feel any strength anymore.
His skin is steel. How can you break him?
A large structure collapses and is about to hit you.
"{STARTQUOTE}What did you do with the stuff you stole, huh?{ENDQUOTE}"
You feel a burning sensation in your wrist.
Your weapon isn't performing like it used to.
Your hands are unsteady, trembling more than usual.
The tension in the air is suffocating.
Your mind feels like it's trapped in a thick fog.
A sinking feeling tells you that you may have made a mistake.
You collapse to your knees, unable to stand any longer.
Your hands tremble as the need for food overtakes you.
Suddenly, your legs give out, and the ground rushes up to meet you.
A flash of light blinds you, and when you regain sight, you're somewhere else entirely.
The landmarks no longer match what you remember.
Every turn feels like the same mistake repeated.
You question if you ever truly knew the way.
You feel a hand on your shoulder. There is no one behind you.
You see people who aren't there.
It feels like someone wants to take your legs.
You have something in your eye...
You see for a moment a place you don't know.
You have never seen such a disgusting creature.
The floor shakes and seems to collapse.
He approaches, reciting a prayer incessantly. Your mind goes blank.
Your arms are shaking from exhaustion.
Your weapon doesn't feel as powerful as it should.
People murmur and shake their heads as you approach.
You can't shake the feeling that something vital is missing.
The strength in your hands is fading fast.
Your vision blurs, and you realize how weak you've become.
You hear a distant scream, and it feels like it's calling your name.
You can't resist. You have to go away.
The signs are faded, and their meanings are unclear.
The forest closes in, obscuring the trail ahead.
The path narrows, then disappears entirely.
They are using some dangerous gas.
The air is incredibly dry around here.
You feel a click under your feet.
You hear a pop. Can you still move?
A group of soldiers mistook you for an enemy.
An explosion causes everything to collapse.
"{STARTQUOTE}You're a damn spy, huh? Speak up!{ENDQUOTE}"
The weight of your weapon is too much to bear.
The accuracy of your weapon is a little off.
A pounding headache blurs your thoughts.
"{STARTQUOTE}Who does he think he is?{ENDQUOTE}" a voice sneers from the corner.
A deep confusion takes hold. You can't shake it off.
The tools you relied on are no longer working.
You stumble, your legs are barely supporting you.
You can't stand the hunger anymore.
A voice whispers urgently, "{STARTQUOTE}Go back before it's too late.{ENDQUOTE}"
The wind howls, carrying whispers that grow louder: "{STARTQUOTE}Return... return...{ENDQUOTE}"
The horizon looks the same no matter where you turn.
Even the stars above offer no guidance tonight.
The road stretches endlessly, with no sign of change.
A sudden ache shoots through your back.
The balance on your weapon feels off.
You hear faint laughter, and you can't help but feel it's directed at you.
Your thoughts slip away before you can grasp them.
Lifting your arms feels like an impossible task.
You thought you recognized a marker, but it was just your imagination.
Every step feels like it's pulling you further from your goal.
The landmarks feel distorted like they belong to another place.
Your legs are cramping from the effort.
Your nose won't stop running, no matter how often you wipe it.
Someone bumps into you roughly without even apologizing.
You thought you were prepared, but now doubt creeps in.
Your head waves, and you struggle to hold it up.
Time feels strange here as if it's slipping through your fingers.
The map you're holding feels useless now.
Your muscles are burning from the effort.
Your throat feels raw, making it hard to swallow.
Someone spits on the ground near your feet and glares at you.
A sharp headache pulses, making it impossible to concentrate.
The gear in your pack rattles ominously.
Every step feels like you're dragging a boulder.
The further you go, the less you recognize anything around you.
Every choice you make seems to lead to a dead end.
You feel a deep, aching pain in your chest.
A sudden dizziness forces you to grab onto something for support.
"{STARTQUOTE}Get out of here,{ENDQUOTE}" someone growls, their voice filled with malice.
The weight of your equipment feels heavier than ever.
Your muscles refuse to respond to your commands.
You feel a wave of nausea rising.
Each movement feels slower than the last.
The ache in your shoulders feels unbearable.
Your thoughts refuse to come together.
It feels like your brain is moving in circles.
Someone points at you and laughs, and you don't know why.

A mocking voice calls out, but you can't see who it is.
Your ears are ringing, and the world seems muffled.
A sound of footsteps. There's someone.
A large hollow trunk forms a tunnel that passes through the dense foliage.
By cutting some branches it is possible to build a shortcut.
You can build a small bridge by moving a few logs.
Someone whispers from a hiding place, offering help.
A narrow corridor runs along the side of the mountain.
Some dangerous animals defend a passage.
A traveler looks at the broken wheel of his wagon with a desperate look.
An elderly guide can help you on your journey... if you resist its incessant chatter.
Someone is calling you from far away.
If you could get to it before it closes...
A small group of pirates defend a passage.
A broken boat floats in front of a narrow stream.
Someone is looking at a map with interest. You might want to check it out...
Someone is keeping an eye on you.
A raider camp is blocking a small road.
Sand has blocked one of the main gates.
A sphinx whispers one of its riddles.
Although the ice is not thick, you should be able to walk across it.
The shortcut goes through a burrow.
With the help of a shovel and patience, you should be able to dig a way through.
The slime is a little higher but you should be able to get past it.
You will have to fight your way through the local wildlife to get through there.
By repairing a small barge you may save time.
"{STARTQUOTE}Are you sure you're on the right path?{ENDQUOTE}"
You feel eyes on your back.

You can try to pass through the crossfire.

A soldier is consulting a map.

When leaving this Zone, roll 1d6: move to the n-th side counting from north and going counterclockwise. Move normally if destination is not reachable.
Do not roll an Encounter in this Zone.
All Encounters in this Zone includes sentient creatures.

When leaving this Zone, perform {symbol agilitySymbol} test: 1 {symbol woundSymbol} on failure.
